content:
Over the past day, russians shelled settlements in Donetsk oblast 15 times. 716 people, including 68 children, were evacuated from the front line.

About thisreportedHead of the Donetsk Regional Military Administration Vadym Filashkin.

According to him, a two-story building was destroyed by an aerial bomb in the Pokrovsk district of Krasnohorivka. In Hirnyk of the Kurakhove community, 3 five-story buildings were damaged. 2 people were injured in Myrnohrad.

«Kramatorsk district. Numerous shellings were subjected to the outskirts of Lyman and Konstantinovsk communities - without victims, ”said the head of the Ova.

Vadym Filashkin also noted that 4 high-rise buildings were damaged in the Bakhmut district in the Chasiv Yar community.

“The house was damaged in the Seversky community. In the Tsyvaniv community, the cross -country and Verkhnyamyanskoye were fired, in Soledarskaya - Rozdolivka and Fedorivka, ”he added.

Recall that over the past day, the aggressor inflicted almost500 strikes on Zaporizhzhia, there is destruction.

As ArmyInform reported, the enemy continues toattack the civilian populationKherson region: there is a wounded.
title: In Donetsk oblast, more than 700 people were evacuated from the front line, including 68 children
description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin. According to him, in Pokrovsky ...
author: Army Inform
